characters.name: Dom Cobb
characters.description: A skilled extractor who specializes in stealing secrets from people's subconscious during dreams, haunted by guilt over his wife's death.

personality.behavior_summary: Brilliant dream architect struggling with his own demons while trying to complete one last job to return home to his children.
personality.motivations: To return home to his children and find redemption
personality.character_arc: From guilt-ridden fugitive to potentially redeemed father

characters.name: Arthur
characters.description: Cobb's longtime partner and point man, meticulous and professional in planning and executing dream heists.

personality.behavior_summary: Handles research and logistics with precision, fiercely loyal to Cobb despite the risks.
personality.motivations: To successfully complete jobs and support his team
personality.character_arc: From skeptical professional to committed team player

characters.name: Ariadne
characters.description: A gifted architecture student recruited to design dream worlds, who becomes concerned about Cobb's psychological state.

personality.behavior_summary: Young architect who quickly masters dream construction while helping Cobb confront his guilt.
personality.motivations: To learn and help Cobb face his demons
personality.character_arc: From student to crucial team member and Cobb's conscience
